name: OTC PR Group
overview:
OTC PR Group reaches investors, consumers, and reporters in hard-to-reach places. BuzzTM press gets you real news coverage in Google News, Yahoo! Finance, and other major news networks.

What do Buffalo Wild Wings (BWLD), Green Mountain Coffee Roasters (GMCR), Dynamic Materials (BOOM), and Southwestern Energy (SWN) have in common? They were unknown at one time. Today, they’re giants companies. And they’re worth millions—thanks in part to smart PR campaigns.

Your company can get big, too. Every day, thousands of small companies waste money on bulk emails, ad campaigns, and gimmicks that just don’t work in today’s online world. Are you looking for cost-effective press?

Are you tired of putting your marketing dollars into advertising methods that don’t work?

Are you trying to figure out how to get the best bang for your marketing dollars?

Look no further.

Get BuzzTM press to deliver a clear message to millions of readers today. Let us clearly explain your business, what you do, share your vision, and show why investors should look seriously at your company. Millions of online readers are now in your grasp. Your journey to reaching millions of readers begins right here, right now.
